ya saquen el puto half life 3 >:v

A sensa√ß√£o depois de terminar esse jogo, foi uma mistura de sentimentos incriveis... eu n√£o consigo me lembrar a ultima vez que um jogo mexeu comigo, do mesmo modo que half life 1 e 2 tocaram o meu cora√ß√£o <3 Recomendo a todos que ainda n jogaram ( apesar de estarem 14 anos atrasados euheuehueh )

La segunda parte de una de las mejores sagas de videojuegos con el motor sourse uno de los mejores motores graficos que e visto con gravedad real en los objetos y una jugavilidad inpecable y una historia que te mantiene pegado al conputador un juego indispensable
I love the Half Life franchies, never gets old playing it. Would recommend playing it for yourself and give it a go.

When Half-life 2 came out it was already pre-installed it on my PC. I had played Half-life 1 to death and Opposing force, Blue shift and any mod I could get my hands on. The seconds counted down until it was 'unlocked' No dissapointment there whatsoever. This new gen of graphics and physics at the time was groundbreaking and the constant fear of being killed, eaten, mutated or whatever keeps the player on their toes. If you have never played HL2 its a must - but play HL1 first, that way you will appreciate the new tech a great deal more.
Muy buen juego maquina crack groso
Play 4 cm and it's done, but overall, it was fun.

This game is an absolute classic and a must have for every steam user. The story is really good although i recommend getting Episode 1 and 2 if you want to have a full experience, matter of fact get half life source too and play through it. Now i only play this game with mods since i have played through the story years ago, multiple times oh yeah YOU CAN mod this game which can allow you to put in at least a couple hundred hours into it. The graphics are nothing special since this is an old game. The Gameplay is just an FPS shooter however if you mod it you can do much more. Overall i recommend this game, it goes on sale often so you can pick it up pretty cheap.

Pros
It works
It's cheap and it's often on sale
I really liked the bug bait weapon
Ravenholm was cool
Ragdoll physics 

Cons
I don't like the way this game looks it just looks meh
This game is very lacking in variety 90% of the action is against combine soldiers where'd the all the other aliens go?
This game may not have cutscenes but it has quite a few oh wow look around at our enviorment and wait for an npc to escort you to the next level moments
I don't like the low ammo caps
The arsenal seems alot less creative this time around
The friendly AI is pretty useless and annoying with the exception of the antlions they are actualy useful

So overall I can't really say I care for this game I'd reccomend just sticking with the first one
Really good game and about to play on most computers on at least or around 60 FPS and thats great. Better than some games that came out in these days. Please make Half-Life 3

This game still holds up incredibly well. I could only imagine how it must have felt to play this for the first time for people back in 2004. Great story and chapters are fun to play through, and the game is just the right amount of length. I very highly recommend that you try this game! This is easily a candidate for a top 5 game for me.

10/10

One of the best games I've ever played.

The graphics is quite good if compared to average 2000s games, and even you can play this game smoothly with high graphics settings on your dad's old Dell PC.

The storyline is also really great and immense. I also love the Eastern European-esque style of City 17.
One of the all-time great classics of any genre. Still holds up marvelously well today.

Half-Life 2 is a near perfect sequel. It takes almost everything that worked from Half-Life and either improves on it, or keeps it much the same. But that simple summation undersells how the Valve team have approached this task. Half-Life 2 is a linear shooter with most of the refinements one would expect from years of work, but it is also a game of a higher order of magnitude than any of the previous pretenders to the throne. The polish and the stratospheric height of the production values mean that Half-Life 2 is a magnificent, dramatic experience that has few peers.
A must play classic, still looking good in 2018

Fantastic story line, i bought the entire half-life franchise for just $3 i believe it was i forgot but i do remember that i bought it at a very low price. It'd be cool to wait for that bundle price just for the laughs of having all the series for a very extremely low price.

Half-Life 2 (as well as the two sequels) is just one of those games where you straight up gotta play it a second time and where you oh so badly want to farm all the achievments there are. And this sort of motivation and fun is in my opinion what [b]truly makes a game great[/b]!
Also its Half-Life, I don't think there is any need for explanation here...
(Yeah and there is ABH which isn't [i]quite[/i] as cool as standard bhopping but still totally insane and one of the best mechanics in Valve games)
El mejor juego de la historia, 20/10
